name: Second Chance (Yobob)
description:
SECOND CHANCE is about a "hero" surviving the perils of being in debt. He meets interesting characters along the way. Mostly those who hate him. You have talking objects that interacts with you. Random NPC that thinks you are a creep. And best of all, a hobo that guides you throughout the game...What more can you get!

*Series of uncontrollable laughter may occur in this game play*

CONTROLS

MOVE: Arrow keys

RUN: Hold Shift

Talk: SpaceBar

Exiting Menu/Exiting: Escape Key

Update 1/21/2017 - Fixed a lot of bugs. Added a few more content. (Hopefully fixed the crashes after long play time)

Update 1/20/2017 - Balanced battles more, fixed saved option (This time), less death progression, and lower file sizes.

Update 1/17/2017 - Balanced battle, fixed save option and also added a save file in case it doesn't work, easier game progression.
